title: Flipped Learning and WebQuest-Based English Language Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level English grammar and vocabulary knowledge
context.additional_context: An environment emphasizing self-directed learning and collaborative problem-solving using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% comprehension in summarizing and presenting academic English papers within three months.
Learners enhance their ability to write English essays reflecting cultural contexts through WebQuest assignments.
Learners maintain over 90% participation in flipped learning discussions while developing critical thinking skills.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
